SEARCH
Module org.example.scdpro2
Package org.example.scdpro2.business.models.BClassDiagarm

Class BClassBox

java.lang.Object
org.example.scdpro2.business.models.Diagram
org.example.scdpro2.business.models.BClassDiagarm.BClassBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BClassBox extends Diagram implements Serializable
Represents a class diagram box in the system. The BClassBox class models a class in a UML-style class diagram. It extends Diagram and includes attributes, operations, relationships, and UI positioning information. It also provides methods for adding, removing, and retrieving components such as attributes and operations.
See Also:

    • toCode

      public String toCode()
      Generates the code representation of the class diagram box. The generated code includes the class name, attributes, and operations.
      Specified by:
      toCode in class Diagram
      Returns:
      The code representation of the class.

    • getType

      public DiagramType getType()
      Returns the type of the diagram. This method returns the class diagram type, indicating that this diagram represents a class.
      Specified by:
      getType in class Diagram
      Returns:
      The diagram type, which is DiagramType.CLASS.
